data.title: Elizabeth Mary (Patton) Brandon (abt.1705-1760)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Elizabeth (Patton) Brandon born abt. 1705 Pennsylvania died 1760 Thyatira, Rowan County, North Carolina including father + descendants + 2 photos + 2 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Descendants

Profile last modified 12 Mar 2024 | Created 16 Feb 2014

This page has been accessed 1,567 times.

Biography

Mary Elizabeth Patton was born about 1705, the daughter of William Patton. Her father's location at this time was uncertain (see "Patton Lineages" with primary sources listed), possibly in Pennsylvania, or Delaware or possibly not yet in America. Her mother's name is apparently not known but an argument is made for "Jane" in Patton Lineage based on a William Patton & wife Jane witnessing a marriage, and based on a sister named "Jane Patton" who apparently married a John Graham.

She first married John Locke and on her gravestone, shared with John Brandon, is listed as Elizabeth Lock (no trailing "E").

She second married John Richard Brandon and was listed as "Elizabeth Brandon" in the 5 Sep 1742 will of her father, William Patton, written at West Marlborough, Chester County, Pennsylvania.[1] The will did not list William's wife so presumably she was dead by this date.

She died 10 Aug 1760 in Rowan, North Carolina and is buried in Thyatira Presbyterian Church cemetery.

Sources

â†‘ Pennsylvania, Wills and Probate Records, 1683-1993 for William Patton Chester Will Books A-C, Vol 1-3, 1713-1755 https://www.ancestry.com/interactive/8802/005534143_00266

Patton lineages : originating in Pennsylvania prior to the American Revolution, 3rd ed. by David V. Agricola, Cleveland, Ohio, 2003. Pages 19.1, 19.3 - 19.4.

The Lockes by Ward Pyles.

Find A Grave: Memorial #107234397

Source: S430314121 Ancestry Family Trees Publication: Online publication - Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com. Original data: Family Tree files submitted by Ancestry members. Ancestry Family Tree Ancestry Family Tree: #155800928
